dcterms:creator: J. C. Herrera
M. A. G. de la Torre

M. A. G. de la Torre
dcterms:description: The Mobile Century Dataset contains data collected for 77 vehicles between 10:00am and 18:00pm on Interstate 880 (I-880), CA, USA, with vehicle trajectory traces at an approximate interval of 3 seconds. It includes GPS log datasets with four features in each data sample: {unixtime, latitude, longitude, speed}. After initial screening, 61 datasets were chosen for analysis.
dcterms:title: Mobile Century Dataset
